headline.main: U.S. NAVY STRUCK 7 MAJOR SHIPS IN BATTLE EAST OF THE SOLOMONS; M'ARTHUR'S PLANES HIT 7 OTHERS; A MAJOR SEA FIGHT

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 1 -- American forces inflicted severe damage on the Japanese fleet in the big sea and air battle fought northeast of Guadalcanal Island last Monday, scoring bomb hits on two carriers, two battleships and two cruisers and two torpedo hits on a third cruiser, besides destroying more than 100 planes and probably destroying about fifty others, the Navy reported today.
abstract: 7 Jap warships hit 100, possibly 150, planes lost in sea-and-air clash east of Stewart Islands
